snippet: President Dilma Rousseff said Monday that Brazil would seek an explanation over a news report that the National Security Agency had spied on the national oil company.
abstract: Brazilian Pres Dilma Rousseff says she will seek an explanation from the Obama administration over a news report that the National Security Agency had spied on Petrobras, Brazil's giant national oil company.
lead_paragraph: President Dilma Rousseff said Monday that Brazil would seek an explanation over a news report that the National Security Agency had spied on the national oil company.

headline.main: Brazil: Answers Are Sought on N.S.A. Spying
